content:
I use Mastodon (a decentralized alternative to Twitter) and would enjoy seeing more CT in my timeline. What are your Mastodon accounts?
Mine is https://mamot.fr/@pintoch, and I just discovered https://mathstodon.xyz/@johncarlosbaez. Looking forward to more!

I know some mathematicians on Mastodon but so far my impression is that there's a lot more category theory happening on Twitter. Also people seem to talk to each other about math a lot more on Twitter: on Mastodon I see posts but very few replies. (Maybe I'm doing something wrong.)

I also found:

  • https://mathstodon.xyz/@paolop (@Paolo Perrone, who does not seem to use the account yet)
  • https://mathstodon.xyz/@mc (@Matteo Capucci (he/him), same)
  • https://mathstodon.xyz/@BartoszMilewski, more active :)
Yeah I have an account but I'm not using it :laughing:
toot toot https://mathstodon.xyz/@OscarCunningham/108889112101425236 :elephant:
